SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: Guide to Digital Transformation in Retail
data.baseline: Finding ways to connect to the consumer directly has never been more critical. Even though the pandemic has hampered operations, the retail industry must accelerate digital transformation and tweak the customer journey to thrive. So how well is it succeeding?

data.title: The Basics of a Software Testing Process and Tips on How to Set It Up
data.baseline: Software testing is a vital part of the development life cycle. It’s what safeguards the long-term success of your solution. But do you really know what it takes to set up and fine-tune a software testing process?

data.title: What Is Digital Transformation in Education and Why Is It So Important?
data.baseline: A popular song declares “we don’t need no education”. Yet acquiring new knowledge and skills, whether at school or university, is crucial for our development and growth. Plus, when learning is combined with leading-edge technology, the outcome is even more profound.

data.title: Digital Transformation in Supply Chain: Key Trends, Technologies, and Use Cases
data.baseline: Nothing exists without change, and the supply chain is no exception. The industry is embracing a fundamental digital transformation that will make it more robust, high-performing, and secure. Read on to see how.

data.title: What Development Methodology Suits Your Project Best?
data.baseline: The success of a software project directly depends on its development methodology. That’s why it’s very important to choose wisely and follow the method that plays to the strengths of your team. But how do you decide on the right methodology?

data.title: Why Do Banks and Finance Turn to  Digital Transformation?
data.baseline: In the digital era all spheres undergo massive transformation. The banking and financial sector are already turning to Web 3.0 technologies. What benefits do companies and clients gain from this digital revolution?

data.title: When Do You Need IT Consultants for Your Project? A Guide on How to Choose the Right One
data.baseline: IT consultants are the guys who can improve your business processes, set up a new project, recommend the optimal tech stack and much more. The benefits are quite clear. But when should you hire them? And how do you choose the best ones?

data.title: What Are the Most Prominent Metaverse Use Cases and Applications?
data.baseline: The concept of the metaverse has already spread to the business market and seized the imagination of leaders working right across the innovative technologies sector. Metaverse technology is making its presence felt in virtual games, business, education, social projects, fashion, and even the property market.
